description:
was a shinobi from Konohagakure.
When Kohari was injured while protecting him during the Nine-Tailed Demon Fox`s Attack, he offered to look after her. Ikkaku said he would look after her since it was the parent`s job to protect their child, not the other way around. He instructed Iruka to flee. Iruka did not listen, forcing other Konoha ninja to drag him away from the battle. His parents were killed by the Nine-Tails. Their names had been added to Konoha`s Memorial Stone when they died.
name: Umino Ikkaku
